import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { user: any = null; constructor(private userApi: UserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { const id = localStorage.getItem('userId'); if (id) { this.userApi.getUserById(id).subscribe(res => { this.user = res; }); } } }
